abstract.t: This document defines monitoring and status MIBs for use when the(Internet Key Exchange) IKE protocol [IKE] is used to create IPsecsecurity associations (SAs). As such, the MIBs provide the linkagebetween IKE (phase 1) SAs and the IPsec (phase 2) SAs created bythose SAs.It does not define MIBs that may be used for configuring IPsecimplementations or for providing low-level diagnostic or debugginginformation. It assumes no specific use of IPsec SAs, except thatthey were created using IKE. Further, it does not provide policyinformation.
